**Title:** Request for Proposals (RFP) for Technical Translation Services
-----------------------------------------------------

### Notice Details

*   **Solicitation Number (número de sollicitation):** NR2SONCR-79208
*   **Closing Date and Time (moment limite):** 2023-02-02T14:00:00
*   **Publication Date (date de publication):** 2022-12-21
*   **Trade Agreements (accords commerciaux):** [Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)](https://www.ic.gc.ca/eic/site/ae-006.nsf/eng/ae02472.html)

### Government Tender Description
----------------------------------------------------------------

**Request Overview**

The Defence Construction Canada (DCC) department is inviting consultants to participate in a Request for Proposals (RFP) contest for technical translation services. This Request for Proposal aims to establish a Standing Offer (SO) for linguistic translation services to support the Department of National Defence (DND) in the National Capital Region (NCR) and Northern Canada (excluding Nunavut).

**Key Requirements**

    *   Recruitment for a one-year Standing Offer (SO) with an anticipated contract value of $275,000.00
    *   The total estimated contract cost per word ranges from $1,000.00 to $40,000.00 for various translation tasks, including routine, urgent, complex, and urgent-complex requests
    *   Bidders can access pricing details on the MERX website.

**Evaluation Criteria**

Proposals will be evaluated based on the expertise, past performance, and ability to deliver the required translation services.

### Invitation to Participate

The Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites qualified consulting firms to submit their proposals for the technical translation services described above. Tendering process details, requirements, and evaluation criteria are outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document, which can be accessed on the MERX website (http://www.merx.com).
